name: Quarantine Cluster
description:
A never-ending game about preventing the spread of a disease.

Game made for the Quarantine Jam 2020.

For the best experience - we recommend using a mouse. 

To play:

Mouse  -  click and drag people away from each other. 

Aim - Don't let anybody touch or the virus will spread. 

Tips - Switch to different countries for different levels of difficulty. 

CountryDifficultyChina5
Italy4UK3Switzerland2Tanzania1
